info.title: DiagnoLeads API
info.description: Multi-tenant B2B assessment platform with AI

post.description:
Register a new user and create a new tenant.

The first user of a tenant is automatically assigned the 'tenant_admin' role.

Login with email and password.

Returns a JWT access token on success.

Login with JSON payload (alternative to form-based login).

Returns a JWT access token on success.

get.description:
Get current authenticated user info.

Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

get.summary: List all assessments for a tenant
get.description:
List all assessments for a specific tenant

**Security**: Verifies user belongs to the requested tenant

schema.title: Response List Assessments Api V1 Tenants  Tenant Id  Assessments Get

post.description:
Create a new assessment

**Security**: Automatically sets tenant_id and created_by

get.description:
Search assessments by title

**Security**: Only searches within the user's tenant

schema.title: Response Search Assessments Api V1 Tenants  Tenant Id  Assessments Search Get

get.description:
Get a specific assessment by ID

**Security**: Verifies user belongs to the tenant and assessment exists

put.description:
Update an existing assessment

**Security**: Verifies tenant ownership before update

delete.description:
Delete an assessment

**Security**: Verifies tenant ownership before deletion

get.description: Search leads by name, email, or company
Get leads with high scores (hot leads)
List all leads for a specific tenant with filters
Get a specific lead by ID

delete.description: Delete a lead (physical delete for GDPR compliance)

AssessmentCreate.description: Schema for creating a new assessment

AssessmentUpdate.title: AssessmentUpdate
AssessmentUpdate.description: Schema for updating an existing assessment

LeadCreate.description: Schema for creating a new lead
